_source.description:
No controllers included. Console, power adapter, sensor bar and audio-video cables included. Console and accessories in good used working condition. All accessories are original genuine Nintendo product. Console has a couple of scuffs but overall is in good cosmetic condition. We have tested and verified that this item functions as it should. Please see all provided photographs for a visual representation of the item you will receive.
CONDITION: Used
BRAND: Nintendo
MPN: RVL-201 (USA)
